      • setupGame

        void setupGame(java.util.List<java.lang.String> playersId,
             java.lang.String neighboursFile,
             java.lang.String continentsFile,
             java.lang.String missionFile)
        Sets up a new Game
        Parameters:
        playersId - id's of all players
        neighboursFile - relations between provinces
        continentsFile - continents and their provinces

      • surrender

        void surrender(boolean confirm)
        Called when the current player gives up
        Parameters:
        confirm - true if player has already confirmed their surrender, false otherwise

      • flushProvinces

        void flushProvinces()
        Inactivates any saved provinces

        void setGameMode(IGame.GameMode gameMode)
        Sets the game type. changes rules.
        Parameters:
        gameMode - what type of winning condition the game will have
